definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: thorn, hook (Targum id.; cf. [[סירם]] in Sab. n. pr. Hom:ZMG xivi (1892), 532);—

pl. [[סִירִים]] thorns, sign of desolation Is 34:13, a barrier Ho 2:8, on Na 1:10 v. [[[סָבַךְ]]]; [[תַּחַת הַסִּיר]] ´[[כְּקוֹל הַסּ]] Ec 7:6 as the sound of thorns (crackling as they burn) under the pot.
pl. [[סִירוֹת]] hooks Am 4:2 (cf. [[דּוּגׇה]] sub [[דגה]]; ‖[[חִנּוּת]]-->; on relation of meanings v. [[חוֹחַ]], [[חֵן]]).
